name: Dead Link: Pages Torn
description: A single page torn from Amanda's journal is the clue that will lure Ellen into dangerous game of deception and greed connected to Grace Manor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel, AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD GPU Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel, AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD GPU Storage: 2 GB available space
